mapper.select: SELECT act_participant.id AS ap_id, act_participant.stu_id AS stu_id, act_participant.act_id AS act_id, act_participant.posttime AS posttime, act_participant.jointime AS jointime, act_participant.checktime AS checktime, act_participant.score_id AS score_id, act_score.`level` AS `level`, act_score.score AS score, act_score.type AS type, activity.`name` AS act_name, activity.starttime AS act_time FROM act_participant INNER JOIN act_score ON act_participant.score_id = act_score.id INNER JOIN activity ON act_participant.act_id = activity.id AND act_score.act_id = activity.id where act_participant.stu_id=#{stu_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and act_score.type=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT activity.isteam from activity where activity.id=#{act_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT students.studentid, students.`name`, studentsinfos.grade, college.`name`, major.`name`, studentsinfos.phone, act_participant.id as ap_id, act_participant.posttime, act_participant.jointime from act_participant LEFT JOIN students on act_participant.stu_id=students.id LEFT JOIN studentsinfos on students.id=studentsinfos.studentid LEFT JOIN college on studentsinfos.collegeid=college.id LEFT JOIN major on studentsinfos.majorid=major.id where act_participant.act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and students.studentid=#{stu_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT students.studentid, students.`name`, studentsinfos.grade, college.`name` as col_name, major.`name` as maj_name, studentsinfos.phone, act_participant.id as ap_id, act_participant.posttime, act_participant.jointime from teammember LEFT JOIN students on teammember.stu_id=students.id LEFT JOIN studentsinfos on students.id=studentsinfos.studentid LEFT JOIN college on studentsinfos.collegeid=college.id LEFT JOIN major on studentsinfos.majorid=major.id LEFT join act_participant on act_participant.id=teammember.team_id where act_participant.act_id=51 and teammember.stu_id=21

SELECT activity.id, activity.name, activity.img, activity.starttime, actinfos.endtime, population.num from activity left join ( SELECT act_participant.act_id, count(act_participant.stu_id) as num from act_participant GROUP BY act_participant.act_id ) as population on population.act_id = activity.id left join actinfos on activity.id=actinfos.act_id order by activity.posttime desc limit #{snum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT activity.id, activity.name, activity.img, activity.starttime, actinfos.endtime, population.num from activity left join ( SELECT act_participant.act_id, count(act_participant.stu_id) as num from act_participant GROUP BY act_participant.act_id ) as population on population.act_id = activity.id left join actinfos on activity.id=actinfos.act_id order by num desc where actinfos.endtime < #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} limit 0,8
